meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>emperor</kanji> <kanji>empress</kanji> is the emperor's wife. That's the <vocabulary>Japanese Empress</vocabulary>, specifically, since 皇 usually refers to the Japanese emperor.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Be careful of the rendaku.
